ul.li: For "background-quantity", initial is "infinite", it applies to all elements, it is not inherited, and percentage values are N/A.

body.h3: If statement above is correct, this h3 heading should have a flag image displayed infinitely. Rules applied are "h3 {background-quantity: infinite; background- image: url(flagbg.gif)}". aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa body.p: All other properties of this page should be UA-default. This is a paragraph, like the one above. However, this paragraph may not be long enough for background image.
